summary: Move CI/CD builds from BuildKite to GitHub Actions for better public visibility and to work around a BuildKite docker-compose plugin bug affecting nightly jobs.
userImpact: This improves build transparency and reliability for contributors and users following the project's CI status.
rootCause: BuildKite docker-compose plugin bug causing nightly job failures
proposedFix: Migrate both per-change and nightly build jobs from BuildKite to GitHub Actions once self-hosted runners are available
resolutionDetails: The migration was completed as indicated by the author's comment 'This was done already'
keyQuote: Once we get self hosted GH actions runners, we should move those jobs for better public visibility.
